refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; command.
This manual page was written for the Debian distribution because the original program does not have a manual page.

&dhpackage; is a command line Java application for processing OSM data. The tool consists of pluggable components that can be chained to perform a larger operation. For example, it has components for reading/writing databases and files, deriving/applying changes to data sources, and sorting data, (etc.). It has been written to easily add new features without re-writing common tasks such as file and database handling.
Some examples of the things it can currently do are:

listitem.para: Generate planet dumps from a database
Load planet dumps into a database
Produce change sets using database history tables
Apply change sets to a local database
Compare two planet dump files and produce a change set
Re-sort the data contained in planet dump files
Extract data inside a bounding box or polygon

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: The commands and arguments accepted by &dhpackage; are described in details and shown in examples in the page and its subpages.
